title: Changing lol Server Region
body:
Hey guys !

I created mt account in NA and transfered it to OCE because I now live in Perth, but in 6 months I'll be back to Europe and I will transfer again my account to EUW.

The thing is, when I go in the shop, I can only change my In-Game name and there's no more server transfer. Even if I have the 2600rp to transfer it still no possibility to change region. Idk if it's not available during pre-season or something else and I'm wondering if you can only change region once.

Feel free to tell me any  information you have, thanks.

replies.body: Server transfers are down right now. At the end of Novermber they estimated another 5/6 weeks before they would be back up. You can keep updated [HERE](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).
